subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Paul Raymond, the only Ivy League player with a decent chance of being drafted this year, could join a tiny, but slowly growing gridiron fraternity: Ivy League education, N.F.L. job.
snippet: Paul Raymond, the only Ivy League player with a decent chance of being drafted this year, could join a tiny, but slowly growing gridiron fraternity: Ivy League education, N.F.L. job.
